synopsis.text: Maise Higa, a first-year high school student, finds her mundane summer life at her family's Okinawan hotel transformed into an extraordinary adventure with the arrival of a mysterious Tokyo native, Ichirou Suzuki. As the enigmatic guest settles in, strange phenomena begin to occur around Maise, such as hotel rooms turning into aquariums and colossal banyan trees bursting through ceilings. Driven by curiosity and intrigue, Maise embarks on a journey with Ichirou to unravel the secrets behind these supernatural occurrences and uncover the true reason for his visit to the remote seaside town. Prepare for a summer of wonder, excitement, and self-discovery in this captivating tale of mystery and friendship.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
